Key Match Events: Dasun Shanaka scored 56 off 22 balls and took 1 wicket in the final over
Post-Match Reflections: Axar Patel and Suryakumar Yadav's partnership was crucial but not enough
Dasun Shanaka's all-round performance kept Sri Lanka in the series
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sri Lanka's Kusal Mendis scored 52 off 31 balls
India's bowlers struggled, conceding 19 runs in the second over due to two back-to-back no-balls
Sri Lanka's Dasun Shanaka took the final over and defended 21 runs
